text: The Good Son is a 1993 American psychological thriller movie directed by Joseph Ruben and starring Elijah Wood, Macaulay Culkin, Wendy Crewson, David Morse, Daniel Hugh Kelly, Jacqueline Brookes. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * Category:1993 thriller movies Category:1990s psychological movies Category:American psychological movies Category:American thriller movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Joseph Ruben
title: The Good Son (movie)
